text: eksath janapada jathika aarakshaka eejansiye nithiwirodhi oththu balima ha sodisi kirim anawaranaya karana liyawili prakashayata pathkirima wenuwen thyagaya gadiyan yues ha woshintan post puwathpathwalata pirinamuna da pramukha sammanalabhiya jathika aarakshaka eejansiye hitapu konthrath sewaka ha akatayuthu helikaranna wana snodan wima pilibandawa sakayak natha.

sakakaru mehothak kalpana kota nawatha piliganna bawa pawasamin ikuth dinaka di thamata athhitawu siradaduwam laba dunne ema puwathpathata adala naduwa wibhagayata gath kalaye di thama wideshagathawa siti nisa bawa pawasiya .ema puwathpath karthruwaraya thamata da pahara dun bawa pawasu sakakaru me sandaha prathishodhanayak idiripath kara athi bawa pawasuweya.bhikshun wahanselagen ha polis niladharingen wiwrutha adhikaranaye samawagatha yuthu bawa pawasu mahesthrathwaraya rakiyawa ahimi wu polis niladhariya yali sewaye pihitawu bawata polispathiwarayagen warthawak kandawa naduwa yali kandawima aprel 21 wana dinata kal thabina.ikuth 24 wana dina adhikarana katayuththak sandaha kolambaa mahesthrath adhikaranaya wetha pamina ema doratuwa idiripita randi siti himiwaru pirisakata sakakaru digu pihiyak penwa asabhya wachanayen banawadi tharjanaya kirime siddhiyak sambandhayen adhikaranaya hamuwe me naduwa pawara thibina.paminilla wenuwen keselwaththa polisiye (22923)ee wijesuriya mahatha peni sitiyeya..
